document.full_text: sudan's northern armed forces accused the south's army on friday of attacking a convoy of northern troops and u.n. peacekeepers in the disputed abyei region, a flashpoint in the run-up to the south's secession.
document.title: peacekeepers, sudan soldiers attacked in abyei
lines_and_colors: sudan's northern armed forces accused the south's army on friday of attacking a convoy of northern troops and u.n. peacekeepers in the disputed abyei region, a flashpoint in the run-up to the south's secession.
